subject: Olympic Games (2010)
Alpine Skiing
Olympic Games (2014)
lead_paragraph: In her final event at the Vancouver Olympics, Lindsey Vonn missed a gate in her slalom run Friday. Maria Riesch of Germany won the event, her second gold at the Games.
snippet: In her final event at the Vancouver Olympics, Lindsey Vonn missed a gate in her slalom run Friday. Maria Riesch of Germany won the event, her second gold at the Games.
